resources.string: Serving the neighborhoods of Ramat Eshkol, Givat Hamivtar, Sanhedria and Sanhedria Murchevet - over 3600 subscribers!
You MAY NOT post ANY free posts on behalf of someone who does not live in the above neighborhoods.

** No part of any Ramat Eshkol Nshei Email may be duplicated in any form without permission from the group's owner. Information and email addresses contained in any e-mails from Ramat Eshkol Nshei may not be used for commercial use. Email addresses and phone numbers posted in the Ramat Eshkol Nshei emails may only be contacted for the purpose of which the contact information was posted. 

** To post or subscribe to this group, send email to ramateshkolnshei@gmail.com. To view all previous emails, login in to your Google Groups account. Emails are listed under “Discussions.” 

Please check the text of your ad carefully - separate emails/updates will not be sent out with corrections! 

The Ramat Eshkol Nshei Email does not take responsibility for the kashrus, honesty or reliability of any of the advertisers in this email.
You MAY NOT post ANY free posts if you are not a resident of Ramat Eshkol, Givat Hamivtar, Sanhedria, or Sanhedria Murchevet.
*** Tell our advertisers you saw their ad here! ***

Notice regarding free ads in "For Sale" and "Wanted" sections:\n1) You may only post two ads in each of these sections per week. Each ad can be no longer than 70 words/numbers.\n2) If you are not moving, you may only post your ad(s) two weeks in a row and after that, once a month.
*** Please check the text of your ad carefully - separate emails/updates will not be sent out with corrections! ***

Email ad to ramateshkolnshei@gmail.com To be sure that your ad is posted in time, please have the ad (and payment if applicable) in by the times listed below.

Text Ads - The email is sent weekly on Wednesday except when notification is sent in advance. Deadline Monday 11pm

Graphic Ads - The email is sent weekly on Thursday except when notification is sent in advance. Deadline Wednesday 10am.
Formatting Requirements for all Text Ads

Text ads are limited to 70 words per ad. 
Please do not use line breaks (the entire ad should be one line). 
Please do not type words that are ALL in caps (they will be edited.) 
If your ad has a title/description, please include that at the beginning of the ad in the body of your e-mail and NOT in the subject line of the e-mail. 
Do not send attachments. 
Links to online documents are allowed for non-business For Sale listings only. 
No links in the title of the ad. 

Please include the location if it will be helpful to those interested in your post and also include other relevant details. For example, if you are renting your apartment, it is helpful to know what street it is on and what dates it is available. If you are selling a used item, it is helpful to post your general location. This makes it easier for people to know whether your post is relevant to them or not without having to contact you.
Price List for Text Only Ads

You MAY NOT post ANY free ads if you are not a resident of Ramat Eshkol, Sanhedria, Sanhedria Murchevet or Givat Hamivtar. You MAY NOT post ANY free ads on behalf of someone who does not live in the above neighborhoods. 

Free ads must be resubmitted each week. (Excluding gemachim) 

Regarding free ads in 'For Sale' and 'Wanted' sections: 
1) You may only post two ads in each of these sections per week. Each ad can be no longer than 70 words/numbers. 
2) If you are not moving, you may only post your ad(s) two weeks in a row and after that, once a month. 

Paid ads will be posted as often as requested (ie. One time only, weekly, biweekly, monthly, by request, etc.) 
You may pay for as many weeks as you'd like in one payment. 

You can request for your PAID ad to be posted first in its section. 30 NIS for ads that are regularly 15 NIS. 50 NIS for 25 NIS ads. 60 NIS for 30 NIS ads.
Click here for details on how to submit an ad.
View the complete gemach list here
**Agents may not use information from this email without permission from ramateshkolnshei@gmail.com. Thank you.
"Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."
Note: Your email address must be pre-approved by the administrator.\nThe administrator\'s contact information is available by word-of-mouth only.
This one-time authorization is to ensure that you are a member of the Ramat Eshkol Nshei

Your email address was not found in the list of pre-approved accounts with the Ramat Eshkol Nshei.

Please contact the administrator for authorization.

If this is a mistake, return to the login screen and enter the correct email account.
Note: The administrator\'s contact information is available by word-of-mouth only.
